actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the portion of the project for flood control protection on Chartiers Creek that is within Allegheny County, Pa. as the "James G. Fulton Flood Protection Project.

summary.text: Designates the portion of the project for flood control protection on Chartiers Creek that is within Allegheny County, Pennsylvania, as the "James G. Fulton Flood Protection Project".

titles.title: A bill to designate the portion of the project for flood control protection on Chartiers Creek that is within Allegheny County, Pa. as the "James G. Fulton Flood Protection Project.
